item.title: Chinese steel factory officials detained after explosion that leaves 4 dead, 6 missing
item.description: Chinese police have detained those in charge of a steel factory in Inner Mongolia after an explosion killed four people

item.title: Philippines discovers new gas deposit near disputed South China Sea
item.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has announced the discovery of a new natural gas deposit near the disputed South China Sea

item.title: Inequality and unease are rising as elite Davos event opens with pro-business Trump set to attend
item.description: The Swiss town of Davos hosts the annual meeting of elites from business, government and culture this week

item.title: US futures sink after Trump warns of higher tariffs for 8 countries over Greenland issue
item.description: European shares and U.S. stock futures have skidded after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened to slap a 10% extra tariff on imports from eight Euro...

item.title: Hackers target Iran state TV's satellite transmission to broadcast exiled crown prince
item.description: Hackers have disrupted Iranian state television to air footage supporting the exiled crown prince
